description: This file defines a theming object for a React frontend project, specifically for styling the UI of a Tic Tac Toe game. It includes a theme type, a theme object with color constants, and a utility function for concatenating class names.

methods.name: export function cx(...classes: Array<string | false | undefined | null>): string { cx
methods.description: Concatenates class names conditionally, filtering out falsy values, to facilitate dynamic class name assignment in React components.

ctags.name: cx
ctags.pattern: /^export function cx(...classes: Array<string | false | undefined | null>): string {$/
